index.name: elixir
index.subtitle: Elixir
index.about: Elixir is a functional, meta-programming aware language built on top of the Erlang VM. It is a dynamic language that focuses on tooling to leverage Erlang's abilities to build concurrent, distributed and fault-tolerant applications with hot code upgrades.

videos.title: Customizing IEx
videos.description: In this episode you will learn some tips about how to customize the IEx.
